pr_title: [HUDI-1254] TypedProperties can not get values by initializing an existing properties

timeline.message:
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/HUDI-1064' into HUDI-1064

# Conflicts:
#	hudi-spark/src/main/scala/org/apache/hudi/HoodieSparkSqlWriter.scala
[HUDI-1254] Fix the bug（TypedProperties can not get values ）

timeline.bodyText: checkKey would be rename to containsKey
timeline.author: leesf

replies.bodyText: I think the checkkey is better。That was its original name。containsKey in  parent class，
replies.author: linshan-ma

replies.bodyText:
I think the checkkey is better。That was its original name。containsKey in parent class，

checkKey should not return boolean and should throw exception from semantically.  containsKey or keyExists should return boolean.
replies.author: leesf
